BasicInfo.short: Carticipate offers a location-based mobile social network for sharing rides and carpooling.

Products.name: Carticipate v1.4
Products.description: Carticipate is the first location based carpool application on a mobile platform and is available on the iPhone.

Products.name: Indalo
Products.description: Indalo is a location based chat (LBC) application which allows one to post messages to a device verified location.

Products.name: DrinkLight
Products.description: Set your drink on the iPhone with this app and set the mood while you enjoy your cocktail at the lounge.
